sentence: Many players felt Ryan Fitzpatrick, who was the clear-cut leader of the 2020 team that finished 10-6, had his team stolen from him when Fitzpatrick was benched for a then rookie Tagovailoa six games into the season.

title: Omar Kelly: Dolphins’ commitment to Tua isn’t unanimous and it could hurt search for coach

sentence: Cornerback Minkah Fitzpatrick, a first-round pick in 2018, ripped Flores after he was traded to the Steelers in 2019.

title: The questions that will make or break Brian Flores’ Giants coaching chances

sentence: Dec. 29, 2019: Dolphins 27, PATRIOTS 24, 88.4 passer rating During their “Tank for Tua” season, Brian Flores, in his first year with Miami after a long career with the Patriots, broke a Dolphins 10-game losing streak in Foxborough as Ryan Fitzpatrick connected with Mike Gesicki from 5 yards out with 24 seconds left.
author: Tribune News Service
title: The Miami Dolphins’ NFL-most 12 victories against Tom Brady

sentence: Players like Chad Pennington, Ryan Fitzpatrick, Kurt Warner and even Drew Brees have carved out respectable NFL careers without possessing a cannon for an arm.

sentence: Their quarterbacks were the 37-year-old retread Ryan Fitzpatrick and the 22-year-old Josh Rosen, who already had been dumped by Arizona, the team that drafted him.

title: Mark Bradley: Will Brian Flores’ lawsuit lead to NFL change? Let’s hope.

sentence: The Dolphins won five games that season despite unloading a litany of key players, including safety Minkah Fitzpatrick and left tackle Laremy Tunsil.
author: Melissa Jacobs
title: If owners really paid coaches bonuses to lose, the NFL is in big trouble

sentence: The Steelers gave Miami their first-round pick for 2020 to acquire Fitzpatrick after Week 2 of the 2019 season.
author: Mark Madden
title: Mark Madden's Hot Take: Instead of trading for Minkah Fitzpatrick, Steelers should have tanked in '19

sentence: He refused because: “I respect the game too much to do that.” While many of the moves the franchise made that season — trading Laremy Tunsil, Kenny Stills, Kiko Alonso and Minkah Fitzpatrick, releasing a number of veterans to clear cap space and starting players claimed off waivers or signed off another team’s practice squad after three days of practice — seemingly aligned with an organization’s attempts to tank, Flores said he viewed those personnel decisions as “a challenge.” His theory is that his defiance ruined his relationship with Ross, general manager Chris Grier and CEO Tom Garfinkel.
author: Tribune News Service
title: Omar Kelly: Brian Flores discusses lawsuit, never agreeing to tank and his relationship with Tua
